misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
Finally made his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after 20 years of trying.
biography: Harri, affectionately known as "the doctor" among his peers, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of Hattula Golf. With a calm demeanor and a strategic mind, Harri is always a player to watch.

Despite his advanced age, Harri is renowned for his unexpectedly bombastic drives, often surprising younger competitors with his raw power off the tee. His dedication to the sport is further exemplified by his relentless pursuit of perfection, culminating in his first-ever hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after two decades of persistent effort.

Having participated in 5 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Harri is set to make his sixth appearance in 2025. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée title twice in previous years. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, Harri's consistent performance and unwavering determination make him a formidable contender in every tournament he enters. He is still an active player in the Hector events.
